sentence: But  in  herself  alone  she  is  more  important  than  all  the  hundreds  of  you  other  roses  :  because  it  is  she  that  I  have  watered  ;  because  it  is  she  that  I  have  put  under  the  glass  globe  ;  because  it  is  she  that  I  have  sheltered  behind  the  screen  ;  because  it  is  for  her  that  I  have  killed  the  caterpillars  (  except  the  two  or  three  that  we  saved  to  become  butterflies  )  ;  because  it  is  she  that  I  have  listened  to  ,  when  she  grumbled  ,  or  boasted  ,  or  ever  sometimes  when  she  said  nothing  .
